title: E commerce Website
description: Developed an e-commerce website with features like product listing, shopping cart, and checkout process. Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, MongoDB.

title: College Chatbot
description: Built a chatbot for college students to access information like class schedules, assignments, and campus news. Technologies: Python, Dialogflow, Firebase.

title: Amazon Clone Website
description: Created a replica of Amazon's website with features like product search, user reviews, and secure payment gateway. Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, MongoDB.

title: Mini Versatile Robot
description: Designed a multifunctional robot with features like object recognition, color detection, QR/text scanning, translation, and virtual assistance. Technologies: Python, OpenCV, Raspberry Pi, Sensors.

title: NDT
description: Developed a non-destructive testing (NDT) software for defect detection in various materials. Technologies: Python, MATLAB, LabVIEW.

title: Loyalty Prediction
description: Built a machine learning model to predict customer loyalty based on their purchasing behavior. Technologies: Python, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow.
